name: Molly the Werezompire
description:
Finding a magical portal to another world? Cool! Being killed soon upon arrival? Not cool. Turning into a Werezompire (Werewolf + Zombie + Vampire) and gaining amazing power? Very cool! Embarking on an interactive story with many different paths & endings? Totally awesome!

Molly the Werezompire is back! Originally released on Xbox Live Indie Games, this classic text-based interactive novel from 2009 is now available on Steam! Experience Molly's original story, before she made cameos in other Zeboyd RPGs.

This game also includes the sci-fi parody, Epiphany in Spaaace! Both games have been lovingly ported, with new backgrounds, editing, music, and more.
